branchCategory.name: CP96S(D), ISO 15552 Cylinder, Single/Double Rod, 125 Bore
branchCategory.description: CP96, profile tube design ISO cylinder with enclosed tie rods, is available in 6 bore sizes from ø32 to ø125mm.  High accuracy covers and tie rod nuts improve mounting accuracy and extend the cylinder life.  Increasing the precision of the bushing and piston rod, as well as reducing tolerances, has decreased the deflection of the piston rod.  Standard strokes range from 25 to 800mm.

breadCrumb.name: CP96S(D), ISO 15552 Cylinder, Single/Double Rod, 125 Bore
